description: This file defines a theming class for a Flutter app, setting up Material 3 theme data with color schemes, widget styles, and custom theme extensions.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides static methods to generate ThemeData for light theme using Material 3 design.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured for light mode, including color schemes and widget themes.

classes.name: AppStatusColors
classes.description: A ThemeExtension for carrying success color, allowing consistent use of success color throughout the theme system.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the instance with optional new success color.

methods.name: lerp
methods.description: Interpolates between this theme extension and another for smooth theme transitions.
